vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: The resource endpoint allows path traversal via the filename parameter, potentially exposing sensitive files on the server

semantic_details.description: Path traversal vulnerability due to unsanitized filename parameter in send_from_directory call
impact: Access to configuration files and system data
scenario: Attacker provides a filename with directory traversal sequences (e.g., '../../../etc/passwd')
Application passes this directly to send_from_directory
Files outside the intended directory are exposed to the attacker
